items.translated_title: After intense backlash, India pulls mandate to pre-install government app on smartphones
items.content: On Wednesday, the Indian telecom ministry said Sanchar Saathi, an anti-theft and cybersecurity protection app, would remain voluntary, and that smartphone makers would no longer be required to preload it on devices they sell.

items.title: Netflix launches a mobile-friendly version of Red Dead Redemption
items.creator: Lauren Forristal
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: Netflix launches a mobile-friendly version of Red Dead Redemption
items.content: Players with a Netflix subscription can now download the game, which features mobile-friendly controls, including touch-screen shooting and navigation. It's important to note that the game does not feature a multiplayer mode and players must be connected to the internet to play; offline gameplay is not available.
